item.title: What is the bonus history of Orient Tech.?
item.description: Orient Tech has announced a 1:10 bonus issue effective January 5, 2026, meaning shareholders will receive one additional share for every ten shares held. The record date and ex-date for this bonus are both January 5, 2026. Time: 53 minutes ago

item.title: Vodafone Idea Ltd’s Mixed Week: -1.34% Price Change Amid High Volume and Volatility
item.description: Vodafone Idea Ltd experienced a volatile trading week from 29 December 2025 to 2 January 2026, closing marginally lower by 1.34% at Rs.11.79, while the Sensex advanced 1.35% over the same period. The stock demonstrated notable intraday swings, hitting multiple 52-week highs before retreating amid heavy option activity and mixed investor sentiment. Despite strong volume and value turnover, the telecom operator’s Mojo Score remains at 46.0 with a Sell rating, reflecting ongoing fundamental challenges amid a cautiously optimistic technical backdrop. Time: 5 hours ago

item.title: India Motor Parts & Accessories Ltd Forms Death Cross, Signalling Bearish Trend
item.description: India Motor Parts & Accessories Ltd has recently formed a Death Cross, a significant technical indicator where the 50-day moving average crosses below the 200-day moving average. This development signals a potential shift towards a bearish trend, reflecting a deterioration in the stock’s momentum and raising concerns about its medium to long-term outlook. Time: 5 hours ago
